Author: justanotherskullkid
Text: I got XS FITTED shirts!   They’re REALLY tight and I hate them. I appreciate the thought but damn :(

Author: IDKijustdrinkhere
Text: I had an ex boyfriend who’s mom would ALWAYS buy me petite XS because she thought I was so tiny. First of all, I am not a petite stature. Second of all, they were always too small and it made me feel awful. But it’s not you that is wrong. It’s the clothing. I’m sorry you have to deal With that.
